item.title: Quickly Website Redesign
item.dc:creator: liliyang
item.description: Introduction In this project, I recreated an existing website in Figma, addressing key pain points and making at least three design improvements. I provided two views of the site, allowing navigation between them using prototyping, and included both mobile and desktop versions for a comprehensive redesign. Changes The main changes are:
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

In this project, I recreated an existing website in Figma, addressing key pain points and making at least three design improvements. I provided two views of the site, allowing navigation between them using prototyping, and included both mobile and desktop versions for a comprehensive redesign.

Changes

The main changes are:

  • Removed carousel, changed it into a still background with text overlay
  • Added boxes to menu items to add color contrast
  • Moved button from Specials page to home page
  • Used actual text for the specials rather than an image for accessibility
  • Added black stroke to text for better contrast
